name: UP01 MarbleRun
description:
It is educational project. I made and published it only for learning.

What the goals did I set for yourself?

  1.  Create BP only project.
  2. Modeling 3d graphics in blender.
  3. Bake textures in blender, setup materials in UE4
  4. Share with friends
  5. Package to win64 and android.
